title: HOW the MMR working ????
body: After i got Plat i got 2 bad game with some troll and then  Riot keep make  me  suffer i dont know how to carry those heavy game  with some adc do less damage than me ... a top panth. Srs they all gold rank how can be that bad ...? Practice in rank ?  why this kind of behavior didnt get punishment .... and how I supposed to win my MMR back with  both mid and ad troll ?
